biography:
Roberto Remigio Benigni, Knight Grand Cross OMRI (born 27 October 1952) is an Italian actor, comedian, screenwriter and director of film, theatre and television.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Roberto Benigni, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
name: Roberto Benigni
place_of_birth: Manciano La Misericordia, Castiglion Fiorentino, Arezzo, Italia
